name: Last Days
description: Save or enslave? "Last Days" is a survival, zombie, horror, rpg game where every choice matters and will affect you long term.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 or Higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 940M or Lower Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 or Higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 940M or Higher Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
